Name: Bulldog
Ingredients: 30 ml Light white rum (charcoal-filtered 1-4 years old)
30 ml De Kuyper Crème de Cafe
50 ml Cola (e.g. Coca-Cola or Pepsi) chilled
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Collins glass .
TOP with cola and briefly stir.
Review: Surprisingly pleasing. Cola cuts through the cream.
Nutrition: One serving of Bulldog contains 264 calories
